text: Watee nyan taplueng hana tangieng-ngieng U wie ngon uneun hana taindah Nyansa di Rasul geumeuhoi gata Sajan ngon gata sinan takeubah Neubri treuk susah keu gata ganda Mangat peue nyang ka bek le tagundah Peue nyang lupot bek le takira Ka keunong bala bek weuh that leupah Peue nyang tapubuet bah barangkapeue Cit that Neuteupue bandum le Allah
